About.paragraph: Shopnpay helps you to collect online payment from your consumer for every sale with just a click of a message.
Why2: Send the payment link to the customer.
Get the payment via credit card, debit card, netbanking, phonepay etc.

Services.name: Customer Registration
Services.text: Shopkeeper register the customer with the valid mobile number.

Services.name: Billing
Services.text: The shopkeeper will be able to raise bills to register and unregistered customers by entering the customer’s mobile number,and send the payment link to customer mobile number

Services.name: Payment by customer
Services.text: Shopowner send the payment link to his customer to collect the payment. Customer can pay there bills via credit card,debit card,net-banking phone pay etc.

Services.name: Client report
Services.text: Download and share reports of every transaction to the customers.

Services.name: Payment mode
Services.text: Accept payments from any app using Shopnpay QR. Send payment links to customers and receive timely payments.

Services.name: 24X7 Multi-lingual Support
Services.text: Get round the clock customer support, available in multiple languages.

Features.title: Share payments on message
Features.text: ShopNpay allow the shopowner the convenience to send a payment link to his customer to collect payment.

Features.title: Notify your consumers
Features.text: allows the shopowner to notify the consumer, about their due payment and the successfull completion of the payment.

Features.title: Add your customers
Features.text: The shopkeeper will be able to raise bills to unregistered customers by entering the customer’s mobile number.

Features.title: Get your payments cashless
Features.text: The shopkeeper can get the payment via Debit card,credit card,Net banking,Paytm,phonepe etc
